con:testCase.name: RightsTokenCreation_with_Unique_MD_Details
con:testCase.con:description: Create the RightsTokenCreate API transaction. Verify that the transactionis a fully populated rights token. Ensure all required field is included in the create request. Send the RightsTokenCreate API transaction. Verify that the token was created successfully and that it contains the ID for the created rights token. Response should pass back a RightsTokenID.
